alert.note: Alert for Central Phoenix; East Valley; Fountain Hills, East Mesa; North Phoenix, Glendale; Scottsdale, Paradise Valley (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 17 at 8:10PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Maricopa County through 900 PM MST... At 810 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Falcon Field Airport, or over Mesa, moving west at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Phoenix, Mesa, Scottsdale, Gilbert, Tempe, Paradise Valley, East Mesa, Mesa Riverview Mall, Tempe Marketplace, Papago Park, Piestewa Peak Park, Arizona Mills Mall, Falcon Field Airport, Salt River Indian Community, Downtown Mesa, South Phoenix, Superstition Springs Mall, Downtown Phoenix, Downtown Scottsdale and Arizona State University. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 145 and 156. AZ Interstate 17 between mile markers 195 and 198. AZ Route 51 between mile markers 1 and 13. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Phoenix; East Valley; Fountain Hills, East Mesa; North Phoenix, Glendale; Scottsdale, Paradise Valley
